txt.en: Discover the encampment of Bail Avarc overlooking the city of Carn Dûm

Although it was all but abandoned for a time after the downfall of the False King and Steward of Angmar, Mordirith, the remnants of the Iron Crown have returned to Carn Dûm, seeking to wield a lost artifact of the Witch-king of Angmar to win dominion over the Free Peoples of Middle-earth.

Although it was all but abandoned for a time after the downfall of the False King and Steward of Angmar, Mordirith, the remnants of the Iron Crown have returned to Carn Dûm, seeking to wield a lost artifact of the Witch-king of Angmar to win dominion over the Free Peoples of Middle-earth.
You have discovered Bail Avarc and sprawling beneath it lies the city of Carn Dûm!
Discover the encampment of Bail Avarc overlooking the city of Carn Dûm.
